examples.example: 当有人遇到危险喊出“救命”时，许多勇敢善良的人纷纷伸出援手相助。

translate.english: When someone shouts "help" when encountering danger, many brave and kind people rush to offer their help.

examples.example: 当小孩不慎落水呼救“救命”时，一位勇敢的青年立刻跳水施救。

translate.english: When the child accidentally fell into the water and shouted "help", a brave young man immediately dived into the water to rescue.

examples.example: 在危急时刻，他大声喊着“救命”，幸好有位热心人士快速跑来帮助他。

translate.english: In a critical moment, he shouted loudly "help", fortunately, a warm-hearted person ran quickly to help him.
